brand: Empower your child with Innovative Education
description: Brane Enterprises Private Limited (nslhub) is a new age, platform-centric organization that has developed a revolutionary solution platform – NSL Hub (Natural Solutions Language). The focus is to surface the ability of business users to rapidly create business applications without spending years writing code. This unique and patent-backed approach will be the first of its kind globally and is currently operational in Hyderabad with offices across India, Singapore, and the USA. With over 1600 engineers and leaders, we are expanding rapidly. Kindly login to our website – https://www.nslhub.com/ for more details.
